meanings.definition: A person who publicly supports or recommends a particular cause or policy.
meanings.sent1: The advocate spoke passionately about protecting the environment.
meanings.sent2: The advocate for animal rights organized a peaceful protest.
meanings.sent3: The advocate brought humor to the serious debate with a clever joke.
meanings.sent4: She was a fierce advocate for equality, always standing up for what is right.
meanings.sent5: The advocate's dedication to the cause inspired many to join the movement.

meanings.sent1: I advocate for healthier food choices in schools to improve children's health.
meanings.sent2: She will advocate for better working conditions for all employees.
meanings.sent3: He advocates for more ice cream breaks at work, but no one takes him seriously.
meanings.sent4: The teacher advocates for reading as a gateway to knowledge and imagination.
meanings.sent5: We must advocate for change if we want to see progress in our community.
